notification_template.name: Уведомление о создании/изменении мероприятия
notification_template.subject: Уведомление о создании/изменении мероприятия
notification_template.body:
<% //---------------------------------- // часовой пояс времени, указываемого в параметрах карточки мероприятия, // если параметр отрицательный укажите (0-X), где X - число часов [десятичная дробь] BASE_TIME_ZONE = 3; //---------------------------------- teOrganizerObject = OpenDoc( UrlFromDocID( OptInt( objDocID ) ) ).TopElem; teEvent = objDoc; // переопределим для удобства чтения file_id = String(teEvent.id).slice(String(teEvent.id).length-6); sOrganizerFullname = teOrganizerObject.fullname; sOrganizerEmail = teOrganizerObject.email; sSubject = Text; sComment = teEvent.comment; sParticipantEmail = ""; sParticipantData = ""; UID = StrHexInt(teEvent.id) bCanceled = (objDocSecID == null) sSender = sOrganizerFullname + " <" + sOrganizerEmail + ">" html_text = "

Описание к событию

"; text=""; month = Month(teEvent.plan_start_date) if(Month(teEvent.plan_start_date) < 10) { month = '0' + StrInt(Month(teEvent.plan_start_date)) } day = Day(teEvent.plan_start_date) if(Day(teEvent.plan_start_date) < 10) { day = '0' + StrInt(Day(teEvent.plan_start_date)) } // START HOUR start_hour = StrRangePos(teEvent.start_time, 0,2) /* start_hour = OptInt(StrRangePos(teEvent.start_time, 0,2))-3 start_hour = '0' + StrInt(start_hour) */ // START MINUTE start_minute = StrRangePos(teEvent.start_time, 3,5) START_TIME = StrInt(Year(teEvent.plan_start_date)) + month + day + 'T' + start_hour + start_minute + 'Z' DT_TIME_START = StrInt(Year(teEvent.plan_start_date)) + month + day + 'T' + start_hour + start_minute + '00' // FINISH HOUR end_hour = OptInt(StrRangePos(teEvent.end_time, 0,2)) end_hour = StrRangePos(teEvent.end_time, 0,2) // FINISH MINUTE end_minute = OptInt(StrRangePos(teEvent.end_time, 3,5)) end_minute = StrRangePos(teEvent.end_time, 3,5) END_TIME = StrInt(Year(teEvent.plan_start_date)) + month + day + 'T' + end_hour + end_minute + 'Z' DT_TIME_END = StrInt(Year(teEvent.plan_start_date)) + month + day + 'T' + end_hour + end_minute + '00' html_text += "

" + teEvent.plan_start_date + " состоится корпоративный звонок. Время созвона: с " + teEvent.start_time + " до " + teEvent.end_time + "

"; if(sComment != "") { html_text += "

Комментарий к событию

"; html_text += "

" + sComment +"

"; } html_text += "

________________________________________________________________________________

"; html_text += "

Звонок в WebSoft WorkSpace


"; html_text += "Щелкните здесь, чтобы присоединиться к звонку"; html_text += "

P.S. Пока работает только на компьютере

"; html_text += "

________________________________________________________________________________

" for(participant in teEvent.block_participant.participants) { teParticipantObject = OpenDoc( UrlFromDocID( OptInt( participant.person_id ) ) ).TopElem; sParticipantEmail += teParticipantObject.fullname +' <'+teParticipantObject.email+'>,'; sParticipantData += 'ATTENDEE;ROLE=REQ-PARTICIPANT;CN=' + teParticipantObject.lastname + ' ' + teParticipantObject.firstname + ';RSVP=FALSE:mailto:' + teParticipantObject.email + '\r\n'; } function cur_date(){ year_cur = Year(Date()) if(year_cur < 10) { year_cur = '0' + StrInt(year_cur) } month_cur = Month(Date()) if(month_cur < 10) { month_cur = '0' + StrInt(month_cur) } day_cur = Day(Date()) if(day_cur < 10) { day_cur = '0' + StrInt(day_cur) } return (year_cur + month_cur +day_cur + 'T' + Hour(Date()) +'' + Minute(Date()) + '00Z') } RSVP_STR='FALSE'; DT_START = START_TIME; DT_END = END_TIME; DT_TIME_STAMP = cur_date(); sMessageBody = ' To: '+sParticipantEmail+' Subject: '+sSubject+' MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="=_mixed 004128EAC32576F1_=" X-Spam: Not detected X-Mras: Ok X-Mailru-Src: mxpdd X-Mras: Ok X-Mailru-Intl-Transport: d,ed4f05e This is a multipart message in MIME format. --=_mixed 004128EAC32576F1_= Content-Type: multipart/related; boundary="=_related 004128EAC32576F1_=" --=_related 004128EAC32576F1_= Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="=_alternative 004128EAC32576F1_=" --=_alternative 004128EAC32576F1_= Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8 '+text+' --=_alternative 004128EAC32576F1_= Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Content-Disposition: inline '+html_text+' --=_alternative 004128EAC32576F1_= Content-Type: text/calendar; method=REQUEST; charset=utf-8; BEGIN:VCALENDAR VERSION:2.0 PRODID:-//WebSoft RRULE:FREQ=YEARLY;BYMONTH=10;BYDAY=-1SU;UNTIL=20101030T230000Z END:STANDARD BEGIN:STANDARD TZNAME:MSK TZOFFSETFROM:+0300 TZOFFSETTO:+0400 DTSTART:20110327T020000 END:STANDARD END:VTIMEZONE BEGIN:VEVENT DTSTART;TZID=Europe/Moscow:'+DT_TIME_START+' DTEND;TZID=Europe/Moscow:'+DT_TIME_END+' DTSTAMP:'+DT_TIME_STAMP+' CREATED:'+DT_TIME_STAMP+' TRANSP:OPAQUE SEQUENCE:0 CLASS:PUBLIC SUMMARY:'+teEvent.name+' DESCRIPTION:'+sComment+' ORGANIZER;CN='+teOrganizerObject.lastname+' '+teOrganizerObject.firstname+' '+teOrganizerObject.middlename+':mailto:'+teOrganizerObject.email+'\n bCanceled == true ) {%> Мероприятие "<%=teEvent.name%>" было отменено организатором <%=teOrganizerObject.fullname%> <%} else {%> <%=sMessageBody%> <%}%>
